node.display_long_description:
Note: 
This game contains multiple unlockable paths - don't stop playing at the first credits roll!

The best-rated paid Oculus Quest App as of January 2021 according to Road to VR!
Won the Adventure Category Award for the Famitsu/Dengeki 2020 Game Awards!
*Famitsu is the most prestigious video game magazine starting in 1986 in Japan

"I found myself completely immersed in ALTDEUS' story…"
GREAT★★★★ – UploadVR

Dive 300 years into the future of Tokyo. Altdeus: Beyond Chronos is a sci-fi adventure full of robot battles, pop music, and emotion. It features 15-20 hours of gameplay with one of the largest branching storylines ever in a VR game. 
Become Chloe, a mecha pilot who will have her revenge and annihilate the Meteora once and for all. Pilot a giant mecha and make the decisions to determine humanity’s future. Explore new choices to uncover new branches of the story and discover all of ALTDEUS’ endings!

Discover the truth, destroy the enemy, and enjoy the cyberspace pop concerts!

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
2020/12/25(v1.0.434)
- The choices can be manipulated with the pointer.
- Fixed minor bugs.

2020/12/11 (v1.0.420)
- Fixed an issue that prevented progress in certain languages.

2020/12/04 (v1.0.414)
- Fixed a crash when booting with certain language settings.

nodes.title: We have launched an animation trailer!
nodes.body_text:
This is more like a friendly reminder.

We’ve recently launched an animation trailer of ALTDEUS: Beyond Chronos.
It’s available on our official YouTube channel.

If you haven’t watched it yet, please go to the channel.

We hope you’ll enjoy it.

Thank you for your continued support.

The MyDearest Team

こんにちは！アルトデウスBC開発チームです！
この度はアルトデウスをプレイ頂きありがとうございます！

既にお気づきの方もいらっしゃるかもしれませんが、2月にクロノスシリースの公式YouTubeチャンネルに、アルトデウスBCのアニメーションPVをアップロードしました！

まだ視聴されていない方は是非ご覧ください！

皆様からの感想お待ちしております！

引き続きご支援のほど、よろしくお願い致します！

アルトデウス開発チーム一同より

nodes.title: Won the Adventure Category Award for the Famitsu/Dengeki 2020 Game Awards!
nodes.body_text:
We’re pleased to announce that ALTDEUS: Beyond Chronos has won the Adventure Category Award for the Famitsu/Dengeki 2020 Game Awards. The Awards were voted by the public in Japan.

Famitsu is the most prestigious video game magazine starting in 1986 in Japan.

Due to the COVID-19, this year’s event was an online stream only on March 7. Before the streaming event, there was an earlier announcement that 3 titles including ALTDEUS: Beyond Chronos became the final nominees of the Adventure Category Award. The award isn’t limited to VR games but rather to all games.

We’re really encouraged to have won the award. If you already played ALTDEUS: Beyond Chronos, we’re happy to hear your thoughts on the review page.

We hope you enjoyed our game and more people will.

Thank you for your continued support.

The MyDearest Team

こんにちは！アルトデウスBC開発チームです！
この度はアルトデウスをプレイ頂きありがとうございます！

既に多くの方がご存知かもしれませんが、3月7日に開催された『ファミ通・電撃ゲームアワード2020』において、アルトデウス: BCがアドベンチャー部門最優秀賞を受賞しました！VRに限らず全てのデバイスのゲームがエントリー対象となる中で受賞ができて、信じられない気持ちでいっぱいです！

これもひとえにゲームを購入し楽しんでくださったみなさまのお陰です！

既にプレイして楽しんで頂けた方からのレビューの感想もお待ちしています！

引き続きご支援のほど、よろしくお願い致します！

アルトデウス開発チーム一同より

node.reviewDescription: I have played a good amount of story games in my life, including VR ones, but this one was the best I have ever played. The other games never really made me feel absolutely immersed or emotional, but this one did it better than you could ever imagine. I felt like I was actually the main character, not just watching the game unfold beyond my eyes. When I first opened the game and got into my first Mech battle, what was happening on screen and the song playing really made me feel like it was all real. It made me feel that this is the game I have always wanted, instantly. I have no bad things to say about this game. If I am being honest, it changed my views on life in some ways. A remember twice in the game, I ended up crying. A lot. Games never usually do this, because the emotional attachment to the people and world around you aren't as displayed as they are in VR. In this, I felt like these were my dear friends. Honestly, this was worth 40$. I really hope the Devs continue to make games in this fashion,  be it a sequel, prequel, or a completely new story with new characters. I trust that they will only make masterpieces. I actually haven't played their first game, "Tokyo Chronos", and am planning on buying it as soon as I possibly can. I highly, highly recommend this. If you are into anime and dislike the world around you, get this game. Immerse yourself into *being* Chloe, if you will. And remember not to stop playing when the credits roll, there is a lot to see and experience.
node.reviewTitle: Best game I have ever played to date.

website_page_meta.description:
Note: 
This game contains multiple unlockable paths - don't stop playing at the first credits roll!

The best-rated paid Oculus Quest App as of January 2021 according to Road to VR!

"I found myself completely immersed in ALTDEUS' story…"
GREAT★★★★ – UploadVR

Dive 300 years into the future of Tokyo. Altdeus: Beyond Chronos is a sci-fi adventure full of robot battles, pop music, and emotion.

This game is highly recommended for people who don’t have a high tolerance against motion sickness.
